$$$#DATE.text:

    ORIGINAL DSNAME:  SBGOLOB.CBT443.FILE551
    ---------------
                    --RECFM-LRECL-BLKSIZE-DSORG
                      FB    80    5600    PO

   PDS117I 5 MEMBERS COUNTED; CUMULATIVE SIZE IS 585 RECORDS


TIME THIS PDS WAS SHIPPED:   02/18/02    23:22:07    GMT-5:00

$$$NOTE.text:
Re:  Your Post

  I had a similar problem a while back before Top Secret fully
  supported the TSO segment.  The CONSOLE (and CONSPROF)
  authorities are picked up from the "RACF" TSO segment.  The
  alternative is to set them via the IKJCNXAC and IKJCNXCI exits.
  I hae working copies of both these exits that set the CONSOLE
  and CONSPROF authority bits if the user also has the OPERATOR
  authority set (if they have one, they might as well have the
  other).  I used these until Top Secret fully supported the TSO
  segment.

  If anyone wants a copy of these exits I will email them if you
  send a private email.

  --
  Martin Leist

--
Martin Leist
Principal Technical Analyst
Itex, Norfolk County Council (UK)

Tel  : +44 (0)1603 222788
Fax  : +44 (0)1603 222939
Email: Martin.leist.itex@norfolk.gov.uk

IKJCNXAC.text:
//C        EXEC  PGM=IEV90,PARM='OBJECT,NODECK,XREF(SHORT)',
//         REGION=1024K
//SYSLIB   DD    DSN=SYS1.MACLIB,DISP=SHR
//         DD    DSN=SYS1.MODGEN,DISP=SHR
//SYSUT1   DD    UNIT=VIO,SPACE=(CYL,(1,1))
//SYSPRINT DD    SYSOUT=*
//SYSLIN   DD  DISP=(,PASS),UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(CYL,(1,1,0)),            *
//         DCB=(BLKSIZE=800),DSN=&&OBJ
//SYSIN    DD    *
IKJCNXAC TITLE ' I K J C N X A C - TSO CONSOLE command activation exit'
*---------------------------------------------------------------------*
*   Original Code written by M. Leist 14/05/92.                       *
*                                                                     *
*---------------------------------------------------------------------*
         SPACE 3
*---------------------------------------------------------------------*
*                                                                     *
*   MODULE NAME  = IKJCNXAC - CONSOLE COMMAND ACTIVATION EXIT.        *
*                                                                     *
*   Descriptive                                                       *
*          Name  = Allow selected TSO users to use the CONSOLE        *
*                  command.                                           *
*                                                                     *
*   Function     = This routine sets required fields in the TSO       *
*                  parameter list to allow selected users to use the  *
*                  CONSOLE command while TOP SECRET support for this  *
*                  feature is not available.                          *
*                                                                     *
*                  This routine allows the use of the CONSOLE command *
*                  for selected users. If the user has the OPERATOR   *
*                  command authority, then it is assummed that the    *
*                  user can have CONSOLE authority and the relevant   *
*                  bytes passed in the parameter list are set so that *
*                  the user is allowed to use the CONSOLE command.    *
*                  The TSO exit IKJCNXCI for the CONSPROF command     *
*                  must also be implemented in a similar manner.      *
*                                                                     *
*                                                                     *
*---------------------------------------------------------------------*
         SPACE 3
*---------------------------------------------------------------------*
*                                                                     *
* Usage                                                               *
*   Registers                                                         *
*            R0    Not used                                           *
*            R1    Address of parameter list                          *
*            R2    Not used                                           *
*            R3    Not used                                           *
*            R4    Not used                                           *
*            R5    Not used                                           *
*            R6    Not used                                           *
*            R7    Not used                                           *
*            R8    PSCB pointer                                       *
*            R9    CONSOLE flags pointer                              *
*            R10   Not used                                           *
*            R11   Not used                                           *
*            R12   Base Register                                      *
*            R13   Reserved - no save area is made avaialble          *
*            R14   Return Address                                     *
*            R15   Entry Point/Return code                            *
*                                                                     *
*   Restrictions                                                      *
*                  No save area is made available by this exit,       *
*                  therefore no services may be invoked that          *
*                  require the use of a save area.                    *
*                                                                     *
*   Dependancies   TSO/E exit IKJCNXCI must also be installed.        *
*                                                                     *
* Entry Information.                                                  *
*                                                                     *
*   Entry Point  = IKJCNXAC                                           *
*                                                                     *
*   Entry                                                             *
*   Specification                                                     *
*                                                                     *
*             R0   Unpredictable                                      *
*             R1   Address of TSO/E parameter list                    *
*           R2-12  Unpredictable                                      *
*             R13  Address of a save area                             *
*             R14  Return Address                                     *
*             R15  Entry point address                                *
*                                                                     *
*   Input        = The input parameter list contains the standard     *
*                  TSO/E exit parameter list with 6 exit dependant    *
*                  data pointers. See the TSO/E V2 Customisation      *
*                  manual for full details. Only the parameters used  *
*                  are documented here.                               *
*                                                                     *
*                         ----------------------------                *
*                  +16 ->|00000002| L'PSCB | @PSCB    |               *
*                         ----------------------------                *
*                        |                            |               *
*                        .                            .               *
*                        |                            |               *
*                         ----------------------------                *
*                  +52 ->|00000001|00000004|  Flags   |               *
*                         ----------------------------                *
*                        0        +4       +8                         *
*                                                                     *
* Exit Information.                                                   *
*                                                                     *
*   Exit                                                              *
*   Specification                                                     *
*                                                                     *
*          R0-R14  Same as on entry                                   *
*             R15  Return code                                        *
*                                                                     *
*   Output       = Return code in R15.                                *
*                  R15=00 Exit processing successfull.                *
*                  R15=12 Exit processing unsuccessfull. CONSOLE      *
*                         issues an error message and then terminates *
*                         processing. A reason code can also be passed*
*                         if required.                                *
*                  R15=16 Exit processing unsuccessfull. CONSOLE      *
*                         terminates processing. No message is        *
*                         displayed.                                  *
*                                                                     *
*                  Only Return Code 00 is set in this exit.           *
*                                                                     *
* Exit.                                                               *
*                                                                     *
*   Exit(normal) = Requested function performed successfully.         *
*   Exit(error)  = Requested function was not performed.              *
*                                                                     *
*                  Return to caller in all cases.                     *
*                                                                     *
*   ABEND Codes  = None.                                              *
*                                                                     *
*                                                                     *
* External References.                                                *
*                                                                     *
*   Services/                                                         *
*    Routines    = None                                               *
*                                                                     *
*   Data Areas   = PSCB via TSO/E standard parameter list.            *
*                  CONSOLE flag bytes.                                *
*                                                                     *
*   Control                                                           *
*    Blocks      = IKJPSCB                                            *
*                                                                     *
*   MACROS         SAVE                                               *
*                  RETURN                                             *
*                                                                     *
*   Manuals      = TSO/E V2 Customisation SC28-1872                   *
*                                                                     *
* Attributes.                                                         *
*                                                                     *
*   LKED         = REUS,RENT,REFR                                     *
*   State        = Supervisor                                         *
*   Key          = 1
*   X-Memory     = Primary only.                                      *
*   Mode         = AMODE(31) RMODE(ANY)                               *
*   APF          = APF authorisation NOT required                     *
*                                                                     *
* Requirements     Any storage obtained must be in a protected key.   *
*                  Subpool 254 for non task related storage or        *
*                  subpool 230 for jobstep task related storage       *
*                  are suggested.                                     *
*                                                                     *
* Change Activity.                                                    *
*                                                                     *
*   92-05-14     Original Code written.                               *
*                                                                     *
*---------------------------------------------------------------------*
         SPACE 3
IKJCNXAC CSECT
IKJCNXAC AMODE 31
IKJCNXAC RMODE ANY
R0       EQU   0
R1       EQU   1
R2       EQU   2
R3       EQU   3
R4       EQU   4
R5       EQU   5
R6       EQU   6
R7       EQU   7
R8       EQU   8
R9       EQU   9
R10      EQU   10
R11      EQU   11
R12      EQU   12
R13      EQU   13
R14      EQU   14
R15      EQU   15
         SAVE  (14,12),,IKJCNXAC_&SYSDATE._&SYSTIME
         LR    R12,R15
         USING IKJCNXAC,R12
         L     R8,16(0,R1)      GET PARAMETER ADDRESS FOR PSCB
         L     R8,8(0,R8)       GET PSCB ADDRESS
         USING PSCB,R8
         L     R9,52(0,R1)      GET PARAMETER ADDRESS FOR FLAGS
         LA    R9,8(0,R9)       GET ADDRESS OF FLAGS
         EJECT
         SPACE 2
*---------------------------------------------------------------------*
*    M A I N   P R O C E S S I N G .                                  *
*---------------------------------------------------------------------*
         SPACE 2
*
* Flag byte meanings:
*
* X'80000000' 1 = Solicited messages to be displayed at terminal.
* X'40000000' 1 = Unsolicited messages to be displayed at terminal.
* X'20000000' 1 = Default profile provided.
* X'10000000' 1 = CONSOLE authority.
* X'0FFFFFFF'     Reserved.
*
         TM    PSCBATR1,PSCBCTRL TEST FOR OPERATOR COMMAND USER
         BZ    NOTOPER          IF NOT SET, NO OPERATOR FUNCTIONS
         SPACE 2
*
* The user has OPERATOR command authority, so allow CONSOLE
*  authority as well.
*
         OI    0(R9),X'F0'      SET TOP FOUR BITS
         NC    0(4,R9),=X'F0000000' TURN OFF ALL OTHER BITS
         B     EXIT             RETURN TO CALLER
         SPACE 2
NOTOPER  EQU   *
         NI    0(R9),255-X'10'  TURN OFF CONSOLE BIT
         SPACE 2
*---------------------------------------------------------------------*
*    E X I T   P R O C E S S I N G .                                  *
*---------------------------------------------------------------------*
         SPACE 2
EXIT     LA    R15,0            SET RETURN CODE 0
         RETURN (14,12),T,RC=(15)
         SPACE 2
*---------------------------------------------------------------------*
*    D A T A   A R E A S .                                            *
*---------------------------------------------------------------------*
         SPACE 2
         PRINT ON,NOGEN
         IKJPSCB
         END
/*
//LKED   EXEC PGM=IEWL,COND=(5,LT,C),
//       PARM='LIST,LET,XREF,MAP,RENT,REFR,REUS,AC=0'
//SYSLIN DD   DSN=&&OBJ,DISP=(OLD,DELETE)
//SYSUT1 DD   DSN=&&SYSUT1,SPACE=(1024,(120,120),,,ROUND),UNIT=VIO,
//       DCB=BUFNO=1
//SYSPRINT DD SYSOUT=*
//SYSLMOD  DD DSN=your.load.library(IKJCNXAC),DISP=SHR

IKJCNXCI.text:
//C        EXEC  PGM=IEV90,PARM='OBJECT,NODECK,XREF(SHORT)',
//         REGION=1024K
//SYSLIB   DD    DSN=SYS1.MACLIB,DISP=SHR
//         DD    DSN=SYS1.MODGEN,DISP=SHR
//SYSUT1   DD    UNIT=VIO,SPACE=(CYL,(1,1))
//SYSPRINT DD    SYSOUT=*
//SYSLIN   DD  DISP=(,PASS),UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(CYL,(1,1,0)),            *
//         DCB=(BLKSIZE=800),DSN=&&OBJ
//SYSIN    DD    *
IKJCNXCI TITLE ' I K J C N X C I - TSO CONSPROF initialistaion exit '
*---------------------------------------------------------------------*
*   Original Code written by M. Leist 14/05/92.                       *
*                                                                     *
*---------------------------------------------------------------------*
         SPACE 3
*---------------------------------------------------------------------*
*                                                                     *
*   MODULE NAME  = IKJCNXCI - CONSPROF command initialisation exit.   *
*                                                                     *
*   Descriptive                                                       *
*          Name  = Allow selected TSO users to use the CONSOLE        *
*                  command.                                           *
*                                                                     *
*   Function     = This routine sets required fields in the TSO       *
*                  parameter list to allow selected users to use the  *
*                  CONSOLE command while TOP SECRET support for this  *
*                  feature is not available.                          *
*                                                                     *
*                  This routine allows the use of the CONSOLE command *
*                  for selected users. If the user has the OPERATOR   *
*                  command authority, then it is assummed that the    *
*                  user can have CONSOLE authority and the relevant   *
*                  bytes passed in the parameter list are set so that *
*                  the user is allowed to use the CONSOLE command.    *
*                  The TSO exit IKJCNXAC for the CONSOLE  command     *
*                  must also be implemented in a similar manner.      *
*                                                                     *
*                                                                     *
*---------------------------------------------------------------------*
         SPACE 3
*---------------------------------------------------------------------*
*                                                                     *
* Usage                                                               *
*   Registers                                                         *
*            R0    Not used                                           *
*            R1    Address of parameter list                          *
*            R2    Not used                                           *
*            R3    Not used                                           *
*            R4    Not used                                           *
*            R5    Not used                                           *
*            R6    Not used                                           *
*            R7    Not used                                           *
*            R8    PSCB pointer                                       *
*            R9    CONSOLE flags pointer                              *
*            R10   Not used                                           *
*            R11   Not used                                           *
*            R12   Base Register                                      *
*            R13   Reserved - no save area is made avaialble          *
*            R14   Return Address                                     *
*            R15   Entry Point/Return code                            *
*                                                                     *
*   Restrictions                                                      *
*                  No save area is made available by this exit,       *
*                  therefore no services may be invoked that          *
*                  require the use of a save area.                    *
*                                                                     *
*   Dependancies   TSO/E Exit IKJCNXAC must also be installed.        *
*                                                                     *
* Entry Information.                                                  *
*                                                                     *
*   Entry Point  = IKJCNXCI                                           *
*                                                                     *
*   Entry                                                             *
*   Specification                                                     *
*                                                                     *
*             R0   Unpredictable                                      *
*             R1   Address of TSO/E parameter list                    *
*           R2-12  Unpredictable                                      *
*             R13  Address of a save area                             *
*             R14  Return Address                                     *
*             R15  Entry point address                                *
*                                                                     *
*   Input        = The input parameter list contains the standard     *
*                  TSO/E exit parameter list with 2 exit dependant    *
*                  data pointers. See the TSO/E V2 Customisation      *
*                  manual for full details. Only the parameters used  *
*                  are documented here.                               *
*                                                                     *
*                         ----------------------------                *
*                  +16 ->|00000002| L'PSCB |  @PSCB   |               *
*                         ----------------------------                *
*                        |                            |               *
*                        .                            .               *
*                        |                            |               *
*                         ----------------------------                *
*                  +40 ->|00000001|00000004|  Flags   |               *
*                         ----------------------------                *
*                        0        +4       +8                         *
*                                                                     *
* Exit Information.                                                   *
*                                                                     *
*   Exit                                                              *
*   Specification                                                     *
*                                                                     *
*          R0-R14  Same as on entry                                   *
*             R15  Return code                                        *
*                                                                     *
*   Output       = Return code in R15.                                *
*                  R15=00 Exit processing successfull.                *
*                  R15=12 Exit processing unsuccessfull. CONSPROF     *
*                         issues an error message and then terminates *
*                         processing. A reason code can also be passed*
*                         if required.                                *
*                  R15=16 Exit processing unsuccessfull. CONSPROF     *
*                         terminates processing. No message is        *
*                         displayed.                                  *
*                                                                     *
*                  Only Return Code 00 is used in this exit.          *
*                                                                     *
* Exit.                                                               *
*                                                                     *
*   Exit(normal) = Requested function performed successfully.         *
*   Exit(error)  = Requested function was not performed.              *
*                                                                     *
*                  Return to caller in all cases.                     *
*                                                                     *
*   ABEND Codes  = None.                                              *
*                                                                     *
*                                                                     *
* External References.                                                *
*                                                                     *
*   Services/                                                         *
*    Routines    = None                                               *
*                                                                     *
*   Data Areas   = PSCB via TSO/E standard parameter list.            *
*                  CONSOLE flag bytes.                                *
*                                                                     *
*   Control                                                           *
*    Blocks      = IKJPSCB                                            *
*                                                                     *
*   MACROS         SAVE                                               *
*                  RETURN                                             *
*                                                                     *
*   Manuals      = TSO/E V2 Customisation SC28-1872                   *
*                                                                     *
* Attributes.                                                         *
*                                                                     *
*   LKED         = REUS,RENT,REFR                                     *
*   State        = Problem Program                                    *
*   Key          = 8                                                  *
*   X-Memory     = Primary only.                                      *
*   Mode         = AMODE(31) RMODE(ANY)                               *
*   APF          = APF authorisation IS  required                     *
*                                                                     *
* Requirements     None.                                              *
*                                                                     *
* Change Activity.                                                    *
*                                                                     *
*   92-05-14     Original Code written.                               *
*                                                                     *
*---------------------------------------------------------------------*
         SPACE 3
IKJCNXCI CSECT
IKJCNXCI AMODE 31
IKJCNXCI RMODE ANY
R0       EQU   0
R1       EQU   1
R2       EQU   2
R3       EQU   3
R4       EQU   4
R5       EQU   5
R6       EQU   6
R7       EQU   7
R8       EQU   8
R9       EQU   9
R10      EQU   10
R11      EQU   11
R12      EQU   12
R13      EQU   13
R14      EQU   14
R15      EQU   15
         SAVE  (14,12),,IKJCNXCI_&SYSDATE._&SYSTIME
         LR    R12,R15
         USING IKJCNXCI,R12
         L     R8,16(0,R1)      GET PARAMETER ADDRESS FOR PSCB
         L     R8,8(0,R8)       GET PSCB ADDRESS
         USING PSCB,R8
         L     R9,40(0,R1)      GET PARAMETER ADDRESS FOR FLAGS
         LA    R9,8(0,R9)       GET ADDRESS OF FLAGS
         EJECT
         SPACE 2
*---------------------------------------------------------------------*
*    M A I N   P R O C E S S I N G .                                  *
*---------------------------------------------------------------------*
         SPACE 2
*
* Flag byte meanings:
*
* X'80000000' 1 = CONSOLE Authority.
* X'40000000' 1 = Default profile provided.
* X'20000000' 1 = All processing completed.
* X'10000000' 1 = Display message IKJ55351I
* X'0FFFFFFF'     Reserved.
*
         TM    PSCBATR1,PSCBCTRL TEST FOR OPERATOR COMMAND USER
         BZ    NOTOPER          IF NOT SET, NO OPERATOR FUNCTIONS
         SPACE 2
*
* The user has OPERATOR command authority, so allow CONSOLE
*  authority as well.
*
         OI    0(R9),X'C0'      SET TOP TWO BITS ONLY
         NC    0(4,R9),=X'C0000000' TURN OFF ALL OTHER BITS
         B     EXIT             RETURN TO CALLER
         SPACE 2
NOTOPER  EQU   *
         NI    0(R9),255-X'80'  TURN OFF CONSOLE BIT
         SPACE 2
*---------------------------------------------------------------------*
*    E X I T   P R O C E S S I N G .                                  *
*---------------------------------------------------------------------*
         SPACE 2
EXIT     LA    R15,0            SET RETURN CODE 0
         RETURN (14,12),T,RC=(15)
         SPACE 2
*---------------------------------------------------------------------*
*    D A T A   A R E A S .                                            *
*---------------------------------------------------------------------*
         SPACE 2
         PRINT ON,NOGEN
         IKJPSCB
         END
/*
//LKED   EXEC PGM=IEWL,COND=(5,LT,C),
//       PARM='LIST,LET,XREF,MAP,RENT,REFR,REUS,AC=1'
//SYSLIN DD   DSN=&&OBJ,DISP=(OLD,DELETE)
//SYSUT1 DD   DSN=&&SYSUT1,SPACE=(1024,(120,120),,,ROUND),UNIT=VIO,
//       DCB=BUFNO=1
//SYSPRINT DD SYSOUT=*
//SYSLMOD  DD DSN=your.load.library(IKJCNXCI),DISP=SHR
